A Matter of Life and Death,'' Barbara Walters ' prime-time special airing tomorrow at 10 p.m. on ABC( Ch. 7).`` It was very surprising,'' Barbara Walters says of David Letterman 's response. I'm very fond of David Letterman and he is of me, but he's enormously private... to have him talk as openly as he did with me about his emotions, and what he went through... I was amazed and very happy.`` Nor did he ever call me up[ afterward] and say,` Leave this out, leave that out.' Barbara Walters also interviews Bill Clinton , Robin Williams , Regis Philbin and Charles Grandison Rose III -- all of whom, like Barbara Walters herself, underwent open-heart surgery. Barbara Walters , 81, had a faulty heart valve replaced last May.

shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
